title: An Act relative to motor vehicle debt waivers

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Kilcoyne of Clinton, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 416) of Meghan K. Kilcoyne and Jacob R. Oliveira relative to motor vehicle debt waivers.  Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure

related_entities.name: committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/14/2025 from 10:00 AM-01:00 PM in A-2

Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on House Ways and Means
